text: yaayyuha alladhina amanu tubu ila l-lahi tawbatan nasuhan ʿasa rabbukum an yukaffira ʿankum sayyiatikum wayud'khilakum jannatin tajri min tahtiha l-anharu yawma la yukh'zi l-lahu l-nabiya wa-alladhina amanu maʿahu nuruhum yasʿa bayna aydihim wabi-aymanihim yaquluna rabbana atmim lana nurana wa-igh'fir lana innaka ʿala kulli shayin qadirun
